question: Match the following types of nuclei with examples shown:
| | Column-I | | Column-II |
| A. | Isotopes | i. | <katex>$Li^7, Be^7$</katex> |
| B. | Isobars | ii. | <katex>$O^{18}, F^{19}$</katex> |
| C. | Isotones | iii. | <katex>$H^1, H^2$</katex> |
explanation: Isotones (Same Neutron count A-Z): <katex>$O^{18} (18-8=10), F^{19} (19-9=10)$</katex> (Matches ii).
